https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7Ua1PiMggYnykNmy8ZDCMA3zleA.jpg Medy, a make-up artist, was given the chance of a lifetime to accompany a concert star to the United States for a performance. She promised her family that she will return after a week. A Mother's Story
